sentences.sentence: During this period, researchers interviewed nearly 3,000 women, some of whom had learnt to read as children, some during the literacy crusade and some who had never learnt at all.
sentences.translation: 在此期间，研究人员采访了近3000名妇女，其中有些人在小时候已经学会了阅读，一些是在扫盲远征运动中学会的，还有一些从未学过阅读。

sentences.sentence: He made it his crusade to teach children to love books.
sentences.translation: 他把教育孩子热爱书籍作为自己的奋斗目标。

sentences.sentence: A crusade left Europe in an attempt to reconquer the Holy City.
sentences.translation: 一支十字军离开了欧洲企图重新夺回圣城。
